page.title: 07Shush - Mum's writing!
page.content: It was one Autumn afternoon in 1978 after our Tuesday playgroup session in Filwood Social Centre when we Knowle West mums decided that we had missed out on schooling and would like to improve our writing and spelling. We asked the W.E.A. whether they could provide us with an understanding man to teach us every Tuesday. After reading and discussing a story or poem with our teacher we would go home and write something to read aloud the following week. By Christmas our teacher decided to publish our efforts in a booklet entitled "Shush - Mum's Writing." Copies were sent to Knowle Westers in Africa, USA, Australia and Canada. We became celebrities, appearing on ITV and BBC television. A second book entitled "Shush - Mum's Writing Again" was later published.
